name: BroadcastPrompt
task: Forward all incoming messages to connected regions

connections.DraftA: Reply to the user request. Think carefully before responding.
connections.DraftB: Reply to the user request. Think carefully before responding.
connections.CombineReplies: Combine the replies into a single reply to the user request, removing redundancies and keeping the salient elements of each.
